text: apane gharon mein tikakar raho aur vigat agyaanakaal kee-see saj-dhaj na dikhaatee phirana. namaaz ka aayojan karo aur zakaat do. aur allaah aur usake rasool kee aagya ka paalan karo. allaah to bas yahee chaahata hai ki ai nabee ke gharavaalo, tumase gandagee ko door rakhe aur tumhen tarah paak-saaf rakhe
